conbody.p: Toggle the FILLMODE system variable to specify the display of filled 2D entities including polyline, hatch, solid, and trace entities. You can launch this command at the Command prompt or within another command by preceding it with an apostrophe: 'FILLMODE. You must use REGEN or REGENALL to see the change.

ul.li: On: Turns on the FILLMODE system variable
Off: Turns off the FILLMODE system variable
